data.title: The MUSIC BOX
data.meta_description: James Parrot, USA, 1932, 30min, Perhaps the greatest of Stan Laurel and Oliver Hardy’s sound shorts (1932), which won them an Academy Award, is a half…
data.text:
Perhaps the greatest of Stan Laurel and Oliver Hardy’s sound shorts (1932), which won them an Academy Award, is a half-hour epic of sorts, most of it devoted to their torturous efforts to deliver a piano to a hilltop home. There are few locations in cinema more memorable than the vertical steps leading to the home of Professor Theodore von Schwarzenhoffen (Billy Gilbert), endlessly and repeatedly crossed by these hapless movers.

This film is screened together with <filmlink id=\"3134\">Duck Soup</filmlink>.
